*Infectra nodded and looked around not really knowing who to choose*

*Then=
 Wrath steps out of the CR Chamber and see's The Radicons with Infectra and=
 walks up to them*
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: n=
bwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, July 07, 2000 3:26 AM
  Subject: Re: Neo=
 Beast Wars


  "Whomever seems friendliest." Airbomber replied to Infectra=
...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nb=
wrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 9:01 PM
    Subject: Re=
: Neo Beast Wars


    Infectra: Okay, umm....which one??? *Infectra says t=
o Airbomber*
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
     =
 To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 7:56 PM
      =
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      "Well, you shall be amazed at how much =
Liono screwed up the future, but you should go and get aquainted with some =
of the other bots." Airbomber said to Infectra...
        ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com =

        Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 4:43 PM
        Subject: Re: Neo Bea=
st Wars


        *Infectra nodded and looked around* Infectra: What should=
 I expect to happen or find out here? *Infectra says to The Radicons*
     =
     ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: n=
bwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 4:49 AM
        =
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          "Give them a chance, I'm sure the=
y'll like you." Airbomber whispered back to Infectra...
            ----- O=
riginal Message ----- 
            From: ilovealllizards 
            To: n=
bwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 3:23 AM
      =
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


            *Infectra smiles waves to a=
ny bots in the Maxi base* Infectra: I don't think they like me. *Infectra w=
hispers to Airbomber*
              ----- Original Message ----- 
         =
     From: THECODE 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sen=
t: Wednesday, July 05, 2000 11:47 PM
              Subject: Re: Neo Beast W=
ars


              "Sure, we'll tell ya." Airbomber said, making sure nobo=
dy was aiming their blaster's at Infectra.

              "Hey, everyone! T=
his is Infectra! She's with us!" Airbomber said. Plintissa growled.

      =
        "These Radicons fired at me, Artist, and Dracona when we tried to h=
elp them and ran away! I don't think they could be trusted!" Plintissa said=
.

              "We have our gestalt form and we're useful and powerful." =
Stranato said. Plintissa walked away angrily...
                ----- Origi=
nal Message ----- 
                From: ilovealllizards 
                T=
o: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Tuesday, July 04, 2000 7:12 PM=

                Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                *Infectra no=
ds and follows the Radicons* Infectra: How can you tell if one is not to be=
 trusted? *Infectra says to the Radicons*
                  ----- Original =
Message ----- 
                  From: THECODE 
                  To: nbwrp=
g@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Tuesday, July 04, 2000 5:36 PM
     =
             Subject: Neo Beast Wars


                  Sinesis and Sinist=
er both kept poking each other, but saying nothing when the other looked. T=
hey both grabbed their swords and were about to stab each other, but they p=
ut the swords away and did a cheesy hug instead.

                  Plintis=
sa and Dracona decided to follow Artist and they walked off to the Ark. Onc=
e there, they entered the base.

                  "Hey, have any of you se=
en a bot come by here just staring?" Plintissa asked. Dracona started to lo=
ok around in logical places a lunatic might hide.

                  Deemos=
 and Inzola got bored of sitting around and drinking tea and they left agai=
n.

                  "Who shall we join with, dear?" Inzola asked.

      =
            "Whomever wants out assistance." Deemos replies. They walk on u=
ntil they see the Alliance base.

                  "This one looks good, l=
ets go and ask them if they have any need for us!" Deemos said. Inzola and =
Deemos walked up to the base.

                  "Ahem, excuse us, but we'r=
e looking to join your fine team, we have been looking for a faction to joi=
n, and it appears that it is you who will obviously win the Neo Beast Wars,=
 so we wish to join you, what fo we have to do to join?" Deemos asked. (Som=
ething reasonable, please, no killing a bot things or anything.)

         =
         Gangon had a nightmare, He was again tied to the magical chair whe=
n Sinister and Sinesis came up to him. Then BrightBlade did, and then Draco=
na. They all pulled of their masks and were 2 headed, one head Inzola, and =
the other head Deemos. Gangon screamed and held hbis head in pain. Gangon w=
oke up, and remembered that he couldn't move. He considered that thing abou=
t getting a replacement body, how it would be a good idea just in case he h=
ad to get out of this dump, which was probable if he wanted to kill himself=
. He waited for Plintissa and Dracona to come back.

                  The =
Radicons looked at Infectra.

                  "Now, all you need to do is=
 follow us, we have set you on friend of the Maximals, I'm sure they won't =
mind, seeing as how you would make a great addition to their group." Airbom=
ber said. They walked inside of the Maximal base, waiting for Infectra to f=
ollow.

                  Artist walked around the war room in circles, not=
 quite knowing where he was going.
